abstract: The Asia-focused bank based in London plans to exit its equity derivatives and convertible bonds businesses, the latest move in its turnaround efforts.
snippet: The Asia-focused bank based in London plans to exit its equity derivatives and convertible bonds businesses, the latest move in its turnaround efforts.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — Standard Chartered, the Asia-focused bank based in London, said on Monday that it planned to exit its equity derivatives and convertible bonds units as its new chief executive, William T. Winters, reshapes the company.

headline.main: Standard Chartered to Wind Down 2 More Businesses in Overhaul

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas

abstract: After resisting calls for more information, the bank says it will make a public disclosure any time it claws back money from any member of the company’s operating committee.
snippet: After resisting calls for more information, the bank says it will make a public disclosure any time it claws back money from any member of the company’s operating committee.
lead_paragraph: After first resisting, JPMorgan Chase is bowing to shareholders on a request to disclose more information when it claws back money from top executives.

headline.main: JPMorgan Says It Will Publicly Disclose Pay Clawbacks
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; JPMorgan Agrees to Disclose Information on ‘Clawbacks’
